room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: Our group had a blast. It was lots of fun for a group of friends, and was very challenging. They made this a fun experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: We had a fun time. I would definitely recommend trying it. The hour went by very quickly. The staff was funny and very helpful in giving us clues to find the keys to escape.

room_title: Escape room "The Rec Room" by Escape the Room Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: There were many clues to find and then piece together. It is not a puzzle, but several activities that rely teamwork and independent thinking.
